meanings.definition: To fly over or above (a particular area)
meanings.sent1: The bird was overflying the forest to reach its nest.
meanings.sent2: The plane will be overflying the city on its way to the next destination.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power was overflying above the clouds, keeping watch over the city.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were overflying the reality, soaring high with endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The kite was overflying the park, dancing gracefully in the wind.

meanings.definition: The act of flying over or above (a particular area)
meanings.sent1: The overflying of the helicopter provided a stunning view of the landscape below.
meanings.sent2: The overflying of the birds created a beautiful pattern in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The overflying of the hot air balloon surprised the spectators at the festival.
meanings.sent4: The overflying of the clouds cast ever-changing shadows on the fields.
meanings.sent5: The overflying of the drone captured breathtaking aerial footage of the event.
